title: 852 70 "A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!"Transliteration: "Gekitō Kaimaku Rufi tai Katakuri" (Japanese:戦いの開始 ルフィVSカタクリ) Aya Komaki Shōji Yonemura September 2, 2018(2018-09-02)
transformers_text:
852 70 "A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!"Transliteration: "Gekitō Kaimaku Rufi tai Katakuri" (Japanese:戦いの開始 ルフィVSカタクリ) Aya Komaki Shōji Yonemura September 2, 2018(2018-09-02)

Sanji, Pudding, and Chiffon arrive at Cacao Island and begin making a new wedding cake with the assistance of the WCI 31, Totto Land's top chefs. In the Mirro-World, Katakuri continues to have the advantage over Luffy. With Brûlée awake again, the Big Mom Pirates prepare to attack the Thousand Sunny.
